body_html:
@peterjc123 For your information, when I try to build pytorch with OpenBLAS (Cygwin version), I didn't install msys2. After getting the same error, I try to build openblas with the latest installed msys2 (MinGW64 shell) and re-build pytorch again provided that msys2\mingw64\bin is in front of cygwin64\bin in environment path.
May be there is wrong setting in my cygwin.
Thank you very much. Great.
